name: Michael Burry
context: Founder of Scion Asset Management, known for The Big Short
description: Semi-public hedge fund manager with hidden connections and SEC filings history

expected_facts.claim: Founder of Scion Asset Management (formerly Scion Capital)
Predicted and profited from the 2007-2008 subprime mortgage crisis
Has Asperger's syndrome, which he has discussed publicly
Trained as a physician at Vanderbilt University Medical Center
SEC 13F filings reveal concentrated portfolio positions
Known for investing in water scarcity and farmland
Was investigated by the FBI in 2010 related to his subprime research
Periodically deletes social media posts and goes silent
Portrayed by Christian Bale in The Big Short (2015)

expected_risks: Concentrated portfolio positions creating market risk
History of contrarian bets that attract regulatory attention
Social media activity causing market movements
